meanings.definition: A cell that contains granules of chromaffin.
meanings.sent1: The chromaffin in the adrenal medulla releases hormones into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the chromaffin under a microscope to understand its function better.
meanings.sent3: The chromaffin cell was feeling colorful today, so it decided to dye its granules purple.
meanings.sent4: The chromaffin acted like a tiny factory, producing and storing important substances.
meanings.sent5: The chromaffin granules sparkled like tiny jewels under the light.

meanings.definition: A substance that stains readily with chromic salts.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a special technique to identify the chromaffin in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent2: The chromaffin reacted quickly to the staining solution, showing its distinct color.
meanings.sent3: The chromaffin seemed to enjoy changing its color whenever it met chromic salts.
meanings.sent4: The chromaffin was like a chameleon, blending in with different dyes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The chromaffin's ability to absorb colors made it stand out in the lab experiment.
